creator: bZ@iq-computing.de
text:
TagBeginGenerator.generateSetters() throws a NullPointerException when a 
specific setter method couldn't be found. For example, I accidentally happened 
to set a bean's setter methods to private instead of public. generateSetters() 
wasn't able to find them, but it used the result of TagCache.getSetterMethod() 
without checking for null (line 196 of TagBeginGenerator.java).

Further, the check for null actually IS there (line 208 of 
TagBeginGenerator.java), but that comes into play way too late.
